text:
Flutter (YC W12) - Gesture Recognition thru Webcame (Flutter.io)

Full-time, Interns, Contract

- Backend Engineer C++ - Front-End Eng - JavaScript - Backend Engineer - Python - Holistic Designer (Interactive Design & Visual Design Skills), someone who wants to use design next generation of interactions and UX through gestures.

Passion for changing the world by enabling gestures as ubiquitous interaction layer for all devices w/ built-in webcam is a must!

Apply: jobs [at] Flutter.io
